title: Mother's Market Kitchen - Brea
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The restaurant is located inside the grocery store. Vegan options on the menu are noted, and there are plenty of vegetarian options. There is a juice bar and a salad bar that's available at the restaurant or for take out. Part of a group of Mother's Market stores in Orange County.
